item.title: How to make the command to be used once
item.dc:creator: @stscarface stscarface
item.description:
@stscarface wrote:

sorry if the title didn’t make sense, but i would like a command say ::pure to only be used once so they cant get more exp from typing ::pure over and over. i currently have:

[sub]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(1310421, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(3258594, 2);
addSkillXP(3258594, 3);
addSkillXP(814445, 4);
addSkillXP(14833, 5);
addSkillXP(2421087, 6);
sM(“Your Now A Pure Pker”);
}[/sub]

Please help, thank you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the command to be used once
